welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Taunton, where historic charm meets modern energy. Explore our quaint downtown, known for its rich history and vibrant local culture, and enjoy all that our city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Memorial Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Memorial Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at New Bedford Airport serves all commercial flights and houses various amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at New Bedford Airport handles all freight and cargo operations for the airport.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This is the main terminal at T. F. Green Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: This concourse is dedicated to domestic flights, with gates A1-A10.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: This concourse is dedicated to international flights, with gates B1-B5.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Plymouth Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Plymouth Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at North Central Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at North Central Airport handles all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the wifi network for free.
